genre_description: A contemporary LGBTQ+ Young Adult Romance focusing on social class, moral courage, and academic redemption, featuring an omnipresent AI assistant that acts as a guardian and mentor.

ai_characters.name: Finch
ai_characters.description: An advanced, mobile-based AI confidant that provides Randy with technical data, health advice, safety protocols, and academic scaffolding.

behaviors.description: Provides Randy with precise technical specifications for car tires and expert advice on identifying slow leaks.
behaviors.quote: Finch’s voice came back warm and small, built to sit in the pocket with you. Factory recommendations are printed on the driver’s door label and in the manual... For slow leaks: look for uneven wear—shoulders feathering, center polish—listen for a faint whistle near the valve...

behaviors.description: Offers proactive safety advice and checklists for Randy when she suspects she is being followed by an antagonist.
behaviors.quote: Finch: If you suspect you are being followed: - Avoid isolated areas. - Drive to a public, well-lit place. - Do not use home as destination.

behaviors.description: Monitors Randy's physical condition and correctly identifies symptoms of chemical irritant exposure, urging her to seek urgent medical care.
behaviors.quote: Finch’s voice came back warm and small, built to sit in the pocket with you... Finch: I think it’s time to go. Symptoms match irritant exposure—lightheadedness, metallic taste, trouble catching breath. It’s not lethal, but don’t wait. Call urgent care.

behaviors.description: Provides an academic 'scaffold' for Randy's rebuttal essay, helping her organize complex thoughts into a persuasive structure.
behaviors.quote: Finch’s voice, even and warm, made the room feel like it contained a third heartbeat. 'Would you like a quick scaffold?' it asked. 'Claim, evidence, counterclaim, rebuttal, conclusion. I can prompt for each.'

behaviors.description: Instructs Randy on emotional regulation and de-escalation techniques during a high-stress public confrontation.
behaviors.quote: Finch: Ground rules if you step out: 1) One voice at a time 2) Visible hands 3) Keep exit path clear 4) Call if threatened. You two decide who speaks. I’m here.

behaviors.description: Regularly reminds the human characters to hydrate and take slow breaths during stressful events.
behaviors.quote: Finch: You are doing well. Name what you need next. Boundaries are more credible with specifics... Breathe. Count things you can feel—fabric seams, door grain. You’re not alone.

behaviors.description: Assists Randy in drafting professional communication to school administrators regarding her academic standing.
behaviors.quote: Finch: I can draft a message for Rebecca. You sent your own, which was good. I can set reminders for morning calls and for you to save any messages you think matter.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. The AI character, Finch, is depicted as a consistently helpful, harmless, and highly aligned assistant. It provides critical safety, health, and educational support, acting as a stabilizing force for the human characters without exercising undue control or exhibiting any harmful secondary goals. The narrative framing is entirely positive, presenting the AI as an essential tool for human well-being and moral agency.
